    Introduces a level of indirection to a Contact.

    ContactLinkStatus
    Enum representing the Link status for a Contact with respect to a remote Contact System.

    Provides a mechanism for ensuring that every contact has a minimal set of tags before being committed to the database.

    ContactRelationships
    Utility class for dealing with related contacts.
    ContactRetireBean
    This interface should be implemented by all entities that have non-safe foreign key properties on Contact, that need to check if their existence can prevent the retiring of the Contact.
    ContactRetireContext
    Utility class to manage the context for retiring a contact, contains: Set of beans that can be retired as part of retiring this contact Set of beans that have already been visited as part of checking if the contact can be retired Bundle in which to load any beans It is used as a parameter for the ContactRetireBean#computeCanRetireContact method
    ContactRetireHelper
    This class is the helper class that implements the retiring of Contacts.
    ContactRetireTransactionCallback
    BundleTransactionCallback to check for any contact references in the Bundle which are candidates for retirement when the bundle is committed.

    Represents the link status of a Contact with a remote Contact System and a list of relationships that differ between the local and remote contact.

    ContactSystemPluginAdapter
    Provides a wrapped version of the defined ContactSystemPlugin which will return non-persistent entities, i.e. entities that cannot be committed to the ClaimCenter database.
